ext_descriptions.ext_description: The chained_representation_link type allows for the designation of a , a , or a .
The represented_definition type allows for the designation of a , a , a , a , or a .

A chain_based_item_identified_representation_usage is a type of
that represents a chain of representations in a graph of representations, where the undirected links in the graph can be instances of entity data types , , or . The directed links are derived from the nodes and undirected links and consist solely of instances of the entity data type . The attribute
of the derived instances is directed towards the root, while the attribute
is directed towards the leaf.
the list of representations in the chain.

ext_description.p: the list of items that relate nodes in the chain.
ext_description.note: The items in the undirected_link are placed correctly relative to the nodes in the chain but are not guaranteed to have a consistent direction along the chain.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the node that is the initial terminus of the chain.
the node that is the final terminus of the chain.
the list of representation_relationships that are derived from the undirected_link and that are consistently directed from the root to the leaf.

The root shall be the node referenced by the attribute
of the initial member of the directed_link.

The leaf shall be the node referenced by the attribute
of the final member of the directed_link.
The tree shall be connected.
The degree of the root node shall be one.
The degree of the leaf node shall be one.
The degree of any node other than the root node or the leaf node shall be two.
If the first element in undirected_link is a , then it shall be used in the root .
The size of the undirected_link shall equal the size of the directed_link.

A characterized_chain_based_item_within_representation is a type of
that represents a chain of representations in a graph of representations, where the undirected links in the graph can be instances of entity data types , , or . The directed links are derived from the nodes and undirected links and consist solely of instances of the entity data type . The attribute
of the derived instances is directed towards the root, while the attribute
is directed towards the leaf.
the list of representations in the chain.

ext_description.p: the list of items that relate nodes in the chain.
ext_description.note: The items in the undirected_link are placed correctly relative to the nodes in the chain but are not guaranteed to have a consistent direction along the chain.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the node that is the initial terminus of the chain.
the node that is the final terminus of the chain.
the list of representation_relationships that are derived from the undirected_link and that are consistently directed from the root to the leaf.

The root shall be the node referenced by the attribute
of the initial member of the directed_link.

The leaf shall be the node referenced by the attribute
of the final member of the directed_link.
The tree shall be connected.
The degree of the root node shall be one.
The degree of the leaf node shall be one.
The degree of any node other than the root node or the leaf node shall be two.
If the first element in undirected_link is a , then it shall be used in the root .
The size of the undirected_link shall equal the size of the directed_link.

A characterized_item_within_representation is a type of
that allows the characterization of a
within a specified .

the

A
within a
shall be characterised at most once.
The item shall be founded in the specified .

A context_dependent_shape_representation is the association of a
with a . The
identifies the shape of a
as it plays the role of the
in a .
The role of context_dependent_shape_representation can be defined in the annotated EXPRESS schemas that use or specialize this entity, or by default, in an agreement of common understanding between the partners sharing this information.
A gasket's shape depends upon whether the gasket is participating in an assembly relationship and, if it is a part of an assembly, the product or products with which it is assembled.
The position of a bolt's shape depends upon the way it is positioned in a given assembly.

a
that is associated with the .

a
that identifies the shape of the related
in the context of a .

ext_description.note: This attribute is an upwardly compatible addition to context_dependent_shape_representation as specified in ISO 10303-41:1994.

ext_description.p:
the
by which the context_dependent_shape_representation is known.
ext_description.note: This attribute is an upwardly compatible addition to context_dependent_shape_representation as specified in ISO 10303-41:1994.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The represented_product_relation shall identify the shape of a .

Each context_dependent_shape_representation shall be the
in at most one .

data type is defined in basic_attribute_schema of this part of ISO 10303.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
An item_identified_representation_usage is an identification of a
within a
as being the element that describes a particular component or part of the property that is described by the .
In an application protocol, an instance of representation describes the shape of a product. One element of the - a curve - represents the boundary of a hole in the product. This entity data type may be used to state that the curve describes the hole, in the context of the entire
describing the shape of the product.

the
by which the item_identified_representation_usage is known.

the
that characterizes the item_identified_representation_usage. The value of the attribute need not be specified.

the identification of the , , , , or
that is represented.

the
that describes the property or aspect of which the definition is a part or component, and that contains the identified_item (directly or indirectly) as one of its items.

the
that describes the identified property or aspect of the representation.

The
that is identified shall belong to the set of items of the
referred to by the attribute used_representation, or shall participate in the definition of one of the items.

A property_definition_representation is an association between a
and a representation of the property.

the identification of the , , , , or
that is represented.

of the property or aspect of the representation.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A shape_definition_representation is a type of . A shape_definition_representation is the association of a
with a
or with a
characterizing a .

The inherited
attribute shall be a
or a
whose definition attribute is a .

The inherited
attribute shall be a .

A shape_representation is a type of
that represents a shape.

A shape_representation_relationship is a type of
in which at least one of the instances of the entity data type
is a .
The
of the shape of a bolt may be related to the representation of a position if the bolt is a part of an assembly.
At least one of the two representations in the shape_representation_relationship shall be a .

The get_directed_link function returns for any list of representations and associated list of
the resolved list of representation_relationships when each member of undirected_link references the correct members of nodes. The get_directed_link function returns UNKNOWN when the input does not satisfy the correctness requirement.
(input) the list of instances of the entity data type representations to be used as a reference for constructing the .

(input) the list of instances of the entity data type , , or
that the function is comparing against the reference to establish the .

The relatives_of_product_definitions function finds all of the instances of the
entity data type that are related to one or more elements of the definition_set argument. Only those relationships that are established by the subtype of the
entity given in the relation_subtype argument are considered by this function.

(input) the set of instances of the entity data type
upon which operations are performed.

the fully qualified name of an entity that is a subtype of the
entity.

The relatives_of_shape_representations function finds all of the instances of the
entity data type that are related to one or more elements of the shape_representation_set argument.
This function is not used in this schema. It is defined here because other ISO 10303 integrated resources and application protocols that use the
entity include rules that use this function.

(input) the set of instances of the entity data type
to be operated on.

the set of
objects that refer to the
through a .

(input) the candidate
to be checked.
